title: League,
body:
There is an issue with Malphite's "R' will not go in the direction you want it to or will over shoot where you mouse is at. 
Also, the game has been crashing 90% of the time when I click on Hex Tech and now when I click on option to report a bad player or honor them

replies.body: If the client is trying to access corrupted or missing assets, it can cause it to crash when requesting those files. This is why running a repair as *Rineyy* suggested is a good place to start. As for the Malphite R issue, do you notice any FPS or latency changes when this happens? I suspect there may be a connection issue going on, but I need a bit more info to be sure.

Repair the game by clicking the question mark icon to the top right of the patcher. Select "Repair" and let the patcher scan and repair corrupt game files. When the process is completed, you'll see the orange "Launch" button.
